tool_description: This API allows you to query SaaS software, products and tools and their meta data such as description, logo, video url, and the features they offer. You can use the name of the feature(s) to query. For example you can answer questions like, "Get all Email Markeitng software".
name: SaaS Softwares and Features API
title: SaaS Softwares and Features API

api_list.name: Software Assets
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to fetch SaaS/Software tools that offer a given list of features (feature tags) or just details of any particular software. The details will include it's website, it's description, etc.
